name: Deft Hands
benefit: You get a +2 bonus on Disable Device and Sleight of Hand skill checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.
mythicBenefit: The bonus on Disable Device and Sleight of Hand skill checks from Deft Hands increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Disable Device or Sleight of Hand check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
text_zh: 你拥有非常灵敏的双手。
benefit_zh: 你的解除装置与巧手技能检定获得+2加值。如果某技能受训等级10以上，则对应加值改为+4。
mythicText_zh: 你那敏捷的双手让人惊异。
mythicBenefit_zh: 妙手专长对解除装置与巧手技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次解除装置或者巧手检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。
